scripts.watch-elm: ls *.elm | entr fish -c 'elm make Main.elm --output dist/elm.js'
scripts.build-js: browserify app.js -vd -o dist/bundle.js && npm run style && cp index.html dist/
scripts.deploy: cp index.html dist/ && npm run build-elm && npm run build-js && surge -p ./dist -d templates.alhur.es
